text: John Kilian also , (March 22, 1811 - September 12, 1884), sometimes known as Jan Kilian, was a German-American Lutheran pastor. He was the leader of the colony known as the Wends of Texas.Kilian, John (1811-1884) (Handbook of Texas. Texas State Historical Association) ==References== Category:1811 births Category:1884 deaths Category:German Lutheran pastors Category:American Lutherans Category:Writers from Texas
